Calls of the function for the following 5 scenarios and their output
```{r}
#a. N=100, s=4, equal allocation to strata, t=2, seed=89675
stratified(100,4,'equal',2,89675)
#b. N=200, s=3, stratum sizes = 80, 70, 50, t=3, seed=124589
stratified(200,3,c(80,70,50),3,124589)
#c. N=60, s=3, equal allocation to strata, t=5, seed=907563
stratified(60,3,'equal',5,907563)
#d. N=450, s=9, equal allocation to strata, t=4, seed=6328
stratified(450,9,'equal',4,6328)
#e. N=100, s=2, stratum sizes=60, 40, t=6, seed=73421
stratified(100,2,c(60,40),6,73421)
```
